org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.server

Class AbstractServerHttpExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.server.AbstractServerHttpExchange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerHttpExchange, Wrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtmosphereServerHttpExchange, PlayServerHttpExchange, ServletServerHttpExchange, VertxServerHttpExchange

    public abstract class AbstractServerHttpExchange
extends Object
implements ServerHttpExchange
    Abstract base class for ServerHttpExchange.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

        public ServerHttpExchange close()
        Description copied from interface: ServerHttpExchange
